channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping AGAIN, 3rd August
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped on the road by Southlands Road and Cowper Road - by the park (a repeat problem)

item.title: Cut wire fence leaving hole for dog to get through, 3rd August
item.description:
There is a hole in wire fence, which my dog got through to neighbouring property. It is rough and in helping her back through it caught my hand and bled.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garrard Close, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Dead branches, 3rd August
item.description:
Hi, I'm not sure whether you can help with these trees as they hang over my garden & I feel they could come crashing down on me or my house & cause a lot of damage to me, thank you & for any advice to help me.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and paint on footpath, 3rd August
item.description:
Northwold Road is full of litter alongside both sides of the streets. I have never seen it this bad. Directly outside my house, paint has been spilled and then tramped into the footpath and needs to be removed. There is also fly tipping.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: After Tuesdays bin collection, glass is now scattered all along the road., 3rd August
item.description:
I think the waste collection trucks split loads of broken glass all along the road. There are various patches at the point the truck stopped to tip wheelie bins in, and glass leaked at each point. It is now spreading all along the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Hindmans Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poisonous plant growing in childrenâ€™s play area, 3rd August
item.description:
Black nightshade is growing in Ferranti Park play area. Leaves and berries are poisonous and could make a child very unwell.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bronze Street, Deptford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate not functioning, 3rd August
item.description:
Sometime ago, just after Bromley Council completed the renovation of the pavements in the High Street and surrounding areas LBB fitted a gate to the side of the Hill Car Park ( we were told at the time to improve footfall at top end of High Street). The subsequently gate blocked access from The Hill to Edison Road. We were consulted by LBB who gave us a 4 digit key code for the gate (as residents). However this gate has stopped working and so we can no longer use it. I would greatly appreciate it if you could arrange for this gate to be fixed. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Naval Walk, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish strewn across park, 3rd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shaw Road, Downham, London
